subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Olympic Games (1972)
Olympic Games (1936)
lead_paragraph: From Berlin in 1936 to Sochi in 2014, the Olympic Games are not just an athletic stage but a political one, The Times’s Sam Tanenhaus explains.
snippet: From Berlin in 1936 to Sochi in 2014, the Olympic Games are not just an athletic stage but a political one, The Times’s Sam Tanenhaus explains.
